languages.text: "Или та. Моим сердцем желали обладать и гордые мужчины с твердым взором, и нежные девы с чувственными голосами, и властные повелители, и яростные предводительницы пустотных разбойников... Разве что Вольных Торговцев не были пока среди близких друзей Джай Хейдари". {n}Контрабандистка дарит вам загадочную улыбку.{/n} "Почему вы спрашиваете, шерин?"

"Or lucky lady, you mean. My heart has been coveted by proud men with hard eyes, gentle maidens with sensual voices, imperious lords, and fierce leaders of void brigands... Only Rogue Traders have not yet featured among Jae Heydari's intimate friends." {n}She gives you an enigmatic smile.{/n} "Why do you ask, shereen?"
languages.original_text: "Или та. Моим сердцем желали обладать и гордые мужчины с твердым взором, и нежные девы с чувственными голосами, и властные повелители, и яростные предводительницы пустотных разбойников... Разве что Вольных Торговцев не были пока среди близких друзей Джай Хейдари". {n}Контрабандистка дарит вам загадочную улыбку.{/n} "Почему вы спрашиваете, шерин?"

Only Rogue Traders have not yet featured among Jae Heydari's intimate friends." {n}She gives you an enigmatic smile.{/n} "Why do you ask, shereen?"

Only Rogue Traders have not yet featured among Jae Heydari's intimate friends." {n}She gives you an enigmatic smile.{/n} "Why do you ask, shereen?"

languages.text: «O afortunada, ¿verdad? Mi corazón ha sido el objetivo de hombres orgullosos con miradas serias, de dulces doncellas con voces sensuales, de señores imperiosos y feroces líderes bandidos... hasta ahora, solo los Comerciantes Independientes faltan entre las amistades íntimas de Jae Heydari». {n}Te lanza una sonrisa enigmática.{/n} «¿Por qué lo pregunta, shereen?».
languages.original_text: "Or lucky lady, you mean. My heart has been coveted by proud men with hard eyes, gentle maidens with sensual voices, imperious lords, and fierce leaders of void brigands... Only Rogue Traders have not yet featured among Jae Heydari's intimate friends." {n}She gives you an enigmatic smile.{/n} "Why do you ask, shereen?"

traits.locale_text: «O afortunada, ¿verdad? Mi corazón ha sido el objetivo de hombres orgullosos con miradas serias, de dulces doncellas con voces sensuales, de señores imperiosos y feroces líderes bandidos... hasta ahora, solo los Comerciantes Independientes faltan entre las amistades íntimas de Jae Heydari». {n}Te lanza una sonrisa enigmática.{/n} «¿Por qué lo pregunta, shereen?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “也可能是位幸运的女士。觊觎我芳心的人，有目光坚毅的傲慢男子，有声音性感的温柔少女，有颐指气使的领主，也有凶悍的虚空海盗首领……只有行商浪人还没有成为婕伊·海达利的密友。”{n}她对你露出了神秘的微笑。{/n}“为什么要这么问，亲爱的？”
languages.original_text: "Or lucky lady, you mean. My heart has been coveted by proud men with hard eyes, gentle maidens with sensual voices, imperious lords, and fierce leaders of void brigands... Only Rogue Traders have not yet featured among Jae Heydari's intimate friends." {n}She gives you an enigmatic smile.{/n} "Why do you ask, shereen?"

traits.locale_text: “也可能是位幸运的女士。觊觎我芳心的人，有目光坚毅的傲慢男子，有声音性感的温柔少女，有颐指气使的领主，也有凶悍的虚空海盗首领……只有行商浪人还没有成为婕伊·海达利的密友。”{n}她对你露出了神秘的微笑。{/n}“为什么要这么问，亲爱的？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「それか幸運な女ね。あたしの心は、厳しい目をした誇り高き男たち、官能的な声を持つ優しい乙女たち、横暴な領主、虚無山賊の獰猛な指導者たちに切望されてきたわ…ジェイ・ヘイダリの親密な友人の中でまだ登場していないのは自由開拓者だけなのよ」{n}彼女は謎めいた笑顔を浮かべる。{/n}「どうしてそんなことを聞くのかしらね、シャリーン？」
languages.original_text: "Or lucky lady, you mean. My heart has been coveted by proud men with hard eyes, gentle maidens with sensual voices, imperious lords, and fierce leaders of void brigands... Only Rogue Traders have not yet featured among Jae Heydari's intimate friends." {n}She gives you an enigmatic smile.{/n} "Why do you ask, shereen?"

traits.locale_text: 「それか幸運な女ね。あたしの心は、厳しい目をした誇り高き男たち、官能的な声を持つ優しい乙女たち、横暴な領主、虚無山賊の獰猛な指導者たちに切望されてきたわ…ジェイ・ヘイダリの親密な友人の中でまだ登場していないのは自由開拓者だけなのよ」{n}彼女は謎めいた笑顔を浮かべる。{/n}「どうしてそんなことを聞くのかしらね、シャリーン？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Ou par quelque heureuse gente dame, vous voulez dire. Mon cœur a tout à la fois suscité la convoitise d'hommes fiers au regard dur, de douces jeunes femmes aux voix sensuelles, de seigneurs aux désirs impérieux et de redoutables chefs de cartels intergalactiques... Seuls les libres-marchands ne figurent pas encore sur la liste des amis intimes de Jae Heydari. {n}Elle vous adresse un sourire énigmatique.{/n} Pourquoi cette question, shereen ? »
languages.original_text: "Or lucky lady, you mean. My heart has been coveted by proud men with hard eyes, gentle maidens with sensual voices, imperious lords, and fierce leaders of void brigands... Only Rogue Traders have not yet featured among Jae Heydari's intimate friends." {n}She gives you an enigmatic smile.{/n} "Why do you ask, shereen?"

traits.locale_text: « Ou par quelque heureuse gente dame, vous voulez dire. Mon cœur a tout à la fois suscité la convoitise d'hommes fiers au regard dur, de douces jeunes femmes aux voix sensuelles, de seigneurs aux désirs impérieux et de redoutables chefs de cartels intergalactiques... Seuls les libres-marchands ne figurent pas encore sur la liste des amis intimes de Jae Heydari. {n}Elle vous adresse un sourire énigmatique.{/n} Pourquoi cette question, shereen ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Oder einer glücklichen Dame, meint Ihr. Stolze Männer mit harten Augen haben sich nach meinem Herz gesehnt, sanfte Maiden mit sinnlichen Stimmen, gebieterische Herrscher und wilde Anführer von Leereräubern ... Nur Freihändler waren noch nicht unter Jae Heydaris intimen Freunden." {n}Sie schenkt dir ein unergründliches Lächeln.{/n} "Warum fragt Ihr, Shereen?"
languages.original_text: "Or lucky lady, you mean. My heart has been coveted by proud men with hard eyes, gentle maidens with sensual voices, imperious lords, and fierce leaders of void brigands... Only Rogue Traders have not yet featured among Jae Heydari's intimate friends." {n}She gives you an enigmatic smile.{/n} "Why do you ask, shereen?"

traits.locale_text: "Oder einer glücklichen Dame, meint Ihr. Stolze Männer mit harten Augen haben sich nach meinem Herz gesehnt, sanfte Maiden mit sinnlichen Stimmen, gebieterische Herrscher und wilde Anführer von Leereräubern ... Nur Freihändler waren noch nicht unter Jae Heydaris intimen Freunden." {n}Sie schenkt dir ein unergründliches Lächeln.{/n} "Warum fragt Ihr, Shereen?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Or lucky lady, you mean. My heart has been coveted by proud men with hard eyes, gentle maidens with sensual voices, imperious lords, and fierce leaders of void brigands... Only Rogue Traders have not yet featured among Jae Heydari's intimate friends." {n}She gives you an enigmatic smile.{/n} "Why do you ask, shereen?"

languages.text: "Şanslı bir hanımefendi de olabilir. Kalbim; sert bakışlı, gururlu adamlardan şehvetli seslere sahip nazik hanımefendilere, buyurgan lordlara ve uçsuz haydut elebaşlarına kadar nicesinin hayallerine girmiştir. Jae Heydari'nin yakınlık kurmayan bir Hür Tacirler kaldı." {n}Esrarlı bir gülümsemeyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Neden sordun şirinim?"
languages.original_text: "Or lucky lady, you mean. My heart has been coveted by proud men with hard eyes, gentle maidens with sensual voices, imperious lords, and fierce leaders of void brigands... Only Rogue Traders have not yet featured among Jae Heydari's intimate friends." {n}She gives you an enigmatic smile.{/n} "Why do you ask, shereen?"

traits.locale_text: "Ya da şanslı bir hanımefendi demek istedin. Sert bakışlı, gurur dolu adamlardan, şehvetli seslere sahip nazik hanımefendilere, buyurgan lordlara ve uçsuz hadutlarının azılı liderlerine kadar kalbim nicesinin hayallerine girmiştir. Jae Heydari'nin yakın arkadaşları arasına henüz girmeyen sadece Hür Tacirler kaldı." {n}Sana esrarlı bir gülümsemeyle bakıyor.{/n} "Neden sordun şirinim?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
